snippet: The president said he had the power to override a defense measure’s limits on the executive branch’s ability to transfer detainees out of military prisons.
abstract: Pres Obama signs defense bill that imposes restrictions on transferring detainees out of military prisons in Afghanistan and Guantanamo Bay; Obama, who had previously threatened veto over bill, also attaches a signing statement to assert his constitutional power to wind down detentions.
lead_paragraph: The president said he had the power to override a defense measure’s limits on the executive branch’s ability to transfer detainees out of military prisons.

headline.seo: Obama Signs Defense Bill, With Conditions
headline.main: Obama Disputes Limits on Detainee Transfers Imposed in Defense Bill
headline.print_headline: Obama disputes Detainee Limits In Defense Bill

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
